price: And do not be like those[10] who say, “We hear,” while they do not actually listen.
arabic: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ سَمِعۡنَا وَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ
footnotes: [10] i.e., the hypocrites and/or the disbelievers.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
